definition: abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
blue-and-green landscape (genre of landscape painting originating in the Tang dynasty, in which blues and greens predominate)

sentences.english: Having leaped from green spring, sad autumn and ruthless winter to next greener summer.
sentences.chinese: 跳過綠春悲秋忍冬和來年更加青綠的夏天。

sentences.english: Turquoise-colored components are, in my opinion, not deployable in a production environment.
sentences.chinese: 在我看來，青綠色的組件在生產環境中是不可部署的。

sentences.english: He makes a resting-place for me in the green fields: he is my guide by the quiet waters.
sentences.chinese: 他使我臥在青綠的草場，又領我走進幽靜的水旁。

sentences.english: After Tang and Song Dynasty, the style of landscape-painting represented by the two Lis weakened gradually.
sentences.chinese: 唐宋以降，以“二李”爲代表的青綠山水逐漸式微。

sentences.english: one is too small and the other turquoise and orange.
sentences.chinese: 一條太小了，另一條是青綠和橙色相間的。

sentences.english: The grass and flowers spread on the ground like coat a layer of green brocade blanket.
sentences.chinese: 那些草和花鋪在大地上就好像鋪上一層青綠色的錦毯。

sentences.english: A pale blue to light greenish blue.
sentences.chinese: 他們說它是相當淡的綠色或青綠色。

sentences.english: But the past, is dark green.
sentences.chinese: 可是從前，就是青綠色的。

sentences.english: Bright white straw with a green tint.
sentences.chinese: 酒色明亮，淡麥杆色略帶一絲青綠。

sentences.english: With a refreshing fragrance which matches with its nicely green looks.
sentences.chinese: 感覺醒神的青綠色，散發清新香氣，提升活力。

sentences.english: Lemon-yellow color with greenish glints. Clean and bright.
sentences.chinese: 檸檬黃酒體閃耀一抹青綠，純淨亮麗。

sentences.english: Looked at the touch of green, I smiled.
sentences.chinese: 看着那一抹青綠，我笑了。

sentences.english: Attractive bright yellow, with pretty pale green hints.
sentences.chinese: 吸引的亮麗金黃色中帶微青綠色。

sentences.english: They said it was a very pretty light green or turquoise color.
sentences.chinese: 他們說它是相當淡的綠色或青綠色。

sentences.english: Straw colored yellow with green glints.
sentences.chinese: 呈麥黃色，兼有柔和的青綠色。

sentences.english: Are the green things twigs of poplars and willows?
sentences.chinese: 青綠青綠的是楊柳條兒嗎？

definition: venation (pattern of veins on a leaf)
bright and beautiful/(of a landscape) gorgeous/(of a color) vibrant
to touch up (a piece of writing)/to add details (to a painting)
shade (of a color, i.e. light or dark)
